node.html: This website now uses GraphiQL and the latest gatsby-plugin-image for the News feeds. If you need a Gatsby site developed, get in touch with us.

frontmatter.title: Newsfeeds now use Markdown, GraphiQL and gatsby-plugin-image

node.html: We use the power of Tailwind CSS to make our site compatible with mobile and tablets.
We updated our website to use the power of Gatsby!
We launch a new website that feels a bit retro but moves us forward with new products, services and workshops. Styled using Tailwind CSS no less
